Song.title: Great Is Your Faithfulness
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge @ 1999 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A]Faithful are Your [E]mercies, Lord, they [B]drench me like the dew [E] [A]Pure and sweet Your [E]holy love, I [B]find my joy in You [E] Your [A]favor greets me [E]like the dawn My [B]burning heart must sing [E] To [A]You who rises [E]over me, With [B]healing [E]in Your, [B]healing [E]in Your [B Bsus]wings.
Chorus: Your [E]faithful[F#m7]ness is [A]higher [B]than the [E]heavens [F#m7] [A]Deeper [B]than the [A]sea [E/G#] Great is Your [C#m7]faithful[B]ness Your [E]faithful[F#m7]ness is [A]higher [B]than the [E]heavens [F#m7] [A]Deeper [B]than the [A]sea [E/G#] Great is Your [C#m7]faithful[B]ness to [A]me [F#m7] Great is Your [C#m7]faithful[B]ness to [E F#m7 A | B (repeat)]me.
Verse 2: You [A]seat me at Your [E]table, Lord, You’ve [B]given me a place [E] You [A]robe me in Your [E]righteousness, ad[B]orning me with grace [E] You [A]crown me with Your [E]victor’s wreath You [B]gained upon the tree [E] You [A]take the oil of [E]gladness And [B]pour it [E]out, You [B]pour it [E]out on [B Bsus]me
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 faithful are your mercies lord they drench me like the dew pure and sweet your holy love i find my joy in you your favor greets me like the dawn my burning heart must sing to you who rises over me with healing in your healing in your wings chorus your faithfulness is higher than the heavens deeper than the sea great is your faithfulness your faithfulness is higher than the heavens deeper than the sea great is your faithfulness to me great is your faithfulness to me verse 2 you seat me at your table lord youve given me a place you robe me in your righteousness adorning me with grace you crown me with your victors wreath you gained upon the tree you take the oil of gladness and pour it out you pour it out on me
